duties_responsibilities.duty: Process escrow for all associations and deposit all in-office payments by check scanner.
Post all checks into the accounting software system and assist with IRS & tax returns.
Process and set up billing for all associations and provide customer service support.
Monitor delinquent accounts, scan & process mail, and complete audit documents.
Assist with short-term disability/long-term disability and benefits offering, handling the bookkeeping duties associated.

education_certification.credential: High school or equivalent (Preferred) with 1 year of bookkeeping and office management experience (Preferred)
